name: Fishmonger X-TREME
description:
Fishing, as a whole, is a relatively uneventful practice. Cast, hook, reel, repeat.

In an attempt to liven up this previously mundane activity, bring in the pyrotechnics, acrobatics, and incredible action that previously were unheard in the world of fishmongering.

Controls:

Boat: Space to send out hook, left/right to move hook (or A/D if you're a gamer)

Plane: Arrows (or WASD) to fly, Z to shoot flames, X to swing your katana. (Don't worry, we sanitized the steel)

Waiter: Left/Right (A/D) to catch fish. Try to get them on the plate. (Sorry, the Health Inspector already caught us once for serving fish that landed on the dock)
